name: NQ64 Arcade Bar - Soho
content_summary:
# HI-GRADE COCKTAILS& RETRO GAMING

[Book now](https://nq64.co.uk/soho/bookings)

[Not your location?](https://nq64.co.uk)

## Welcome to NQ64 Arcade Bar, Soho!

Our neon-splattered bar is open late 7 days a week on Berwick St, right in the middle of London, just off Oxford St.

Head down for game-themed cocktails, retro arcade machines and consoles, specially-chosen beers, wines, spirits, and sodas, and all the good vibes you can shake a stick at.
